* the little fuzz-ball had managed to twist out of Iron Raptors grasp, 
thanks to Snow Tech, who had disterbed the little one from the peacful calm 
of studying this most intriging creature called Iron Raptor. He fluttered 
over on little wings to a new, more intresting creature which he hadn't 
studied. He hovered over the male-bots face and looked deep into his eyes, 
then zoomed around his head, settling on his shoulders for a moment then 
flying to another perch on Prowl. After thouroly inspecting him, he then 
decided that Prowls head was a comfortable perch and landed on the very top 
of his head, and nestling in his hair.*

" Mew?"

>From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Old Friends.
>Date: Thu, 07 Dec 2000 11:50:14 -0800
>
>
>* Iron Raptor kept a hold on the little cat/bot, looking him over and
>thinking that he was rather a cute little puff of fur.
>Tiny and with those cute little wings coming from his shoulders.
>
>She looks on past the little creature towards Prowl, knowing that she still
>had durt him but found no other words to say...or think.
>Iron Raptor leans her weight on her other leg for a moment before she
>suddenly heard foot-falls heading in their direction, looking towards the
>sound and then seeing a familier face.
>It was ShadowCat, then hearing her before another past friend blundered 
>into
>his sister and left them in a pile at her feet.
>Looking down at them as if she wasn't amused, lifting a brow.*
>
>< ...yeah....>
>
>* Her mind too occupied with seeing her friends to pick up the scan of
>Arcangel, but picking up on Prowls thoughts instead.
>She looked up at him, a puzzled expression on her face.*
>
>< Arcangle? But I ordered everyong to forget this and go to the meeting.
>But, might as well let him get here, then we can all go back to base.>
>
>* Iron Raptor then looked down at her friends again, all in one large heap.
>She simply sighed, still noticing the small fuzz-ball under her fingers.
>She looked ShadowCat and SnowTech over, they hadn't seemed to change from
>the last time she had seen them.
>But...she had changed...quite a bit.
>Iron Raptor looked at the moving mass of arms and legs for a moment more
>before bending over and looking down at them, simply letting the small
>cat/bot go and leting her hands rest on her knees.*
>
>" So, what brings you two here?"
>
>* Since they couldn't hear her thoughts, verbal communication was needed.
>Though, she really didn't mind.*
>
>
>
>
>
